KLM
WORLD BUSINESS CLASS

A matter of taste:
KLM's wine cellar in the sky
With wine, the truth is not on the label but
behind it - in the bottle. Only by sampling a
wine, can its quality be judged. This is why
KLM has it's own wine tasting panel - a dedicat-
ed group of experts who select the best possible
wines for you, our passenger, throughout the
year. At the panel sessions, tastings are always
blind. In this way, the participants are not influ-
enced by name or reputation but only by the
intrinsic qualities of the wine itself compared
with wines from the same country, region or
grape. The samples often come straight from
the producers themselves, so that KLM's wine
cellar in the sky regularly carries exclusive wines
no other airline can offer.
Looking at our wine list, you will find wines
from famous, classical regions as well as 'KLM's
Special wine' which changes more frequently.
By offering you a choice of our classical stan-
dard wines or our special wine, KLM affirms the
indisputable truth that wine means variety.
Please judge for yourself - ask the cabin staff to
let you try the various wines and you will discov-
er your favourite wine and food combinations,
which are - of course - very much, a matter of
taste.
Hubrecht Duyker
Wine writer
